articles.description: England fans' reactions to the Three Lions' performances at Euro 2024 are "creating an unusual environment", says manager Gareth Southgate.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Gareth Southgate says fans' reactions creating "unusual environment"

articles.description: England "cannot afford to mismanage" their "massive talents" says Gary Neville after another underwhelming performance in a 0-0 draw with Slovenia.
articles.title: England 0-0 Slovenia reaction: Gary Neville says Gareth Southgate 'cannot afford to mismanage massive talents'

articles.description: Ralf Rangnick struggled during his interim stint at Manchester United but he has restored his reputation at Austria and led them to the Euro 2024 knockouts.
articles.title: Euro 2024: How Ralf Rangnick restored reputation with Austria

articles.description: In 2021, La Palma's volcanos erupted, issuing tonnes of molten rock and a reminder of the perilious nature of the island's premier running race.
articles.title: Transvulcania - the race on the rim of La Palma's volcanos

articles.description: Serbia failed to put up a fight as they were knocked out of Euro 2024 following a draw which saw Denmark progress.
articles.title: Denmark 0-0 Serbia: Danes reach Euro 2024 last 16 after tame Munich draw

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from France vs Poland in the UEFA Euro 2024
articles.title: France vs Poland: UEFA Euro 2024 - BBC Sport

articles.description: Oleksandr Usyk gives up his IBF belt just weeks after becoming heavyweight boxing's first undisputed champion in nearly 25 years.
articles.title: Oleksandr Usyk no longer undisputed champion after giving up IBF belt

articles.title: England vs Slovenia: UEFA Euro 2024 - BBC Sport

articles.description: Legendary former Arsenal and France striker Thierry Henry is one of the names being considered to succeed Rob Page as Wales manager.
articles.title: Thierry Henry: Arsenal great could succeed Rob Page as Wales boss

articles.description: BBC Sport takes a look at England's possible routes through the Euro 2024 knockout stage after the Three Lions top Group C.
articles.title: Euro 2024: What are England's routes to through the knockouts?
